Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Sonata in G major, D 894

1826 · op. 78

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 39'

  • 1. Molto moderato e cantabile
  • 2. Andante
  • 3. Menuetto: Allegro moderato
  • 4. Allegretto

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/3 · BA 5537 · Klaviersonaten III · ed. Walburga Litschauer [including first version of mov. 2]
  • Associated Board · Complete Pianoforte Sonatas / Volume III · ed. Howard Ferguson
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9644 · Klaviersonaten III / Die späten Sonaten · ed. Walburga Litschauer
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9615 · ed. Walburga Litschauer
  • Henle · HN 148 · Klaviersonaten / Band II · ed. Paul Mies
  • Henle · HN 149 · Klaviersonaten / Band II · ed. Paul Mies
  • Henle · HN 1362 · ed. Dominik Rahmer
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50222 · Sämtliche Klaviersonaten / Band 3 · ed. Martino Tirimo

1. Molto moderato e cantabile

Duration: 17' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Andante

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 3.5

3. Menuetto: Allegro moderato

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

4. Allegretto

Duration: 9'

Difficulty: 3.5
